guide.p0: Pet's main feature is the movement speed bonus. This bonus is only active on open world. Some pets also have their own level and skills which can be really useful.
guide.p1: Eggs are the items you equip to spawn the pet. You can see pet's experience, speed bonus and skills. You can get eggs from dungeon prize chests or quests.
guide.p2: Pets automatically cast their skills when there is a target. Some skills get stronger or gain bonus effects at higher levels.
